Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、ずいぶん 苦しんだんだネ……
Entry.EnglishText: You must have suffered a lot, <Eugene>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンでバイラスと戦ってた時も、 ずっと様子がおかしかったのも全部……
Entry.EnglishText: During that time you fought those Birus in Nolzen, and all those other times you were acting strange...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちがいてくれた事で 救われた……ずいぶんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Having everyone by my side is what saved me... I owe a lot to you all.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクも役に立ってたかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Was I able to help, too?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの優しさに、何度も救われた…… <Mao>……ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: I was saved by your kindness more times than I can count... <Mao>... Thank you...
